TheWord.Title: You are the Star and we followed ... You.

Prophet.Commentary: When they had heard the king, they departed; and, lo, the star, which they saw in the east, went before them, till it came and stood over where the young child was (Matthew 2:9). The Lord said, If you had faith as a grain of mustard seed, you might say unto this sycamine tree, Be you plucked up by the root, and be you planted in the sea; and it should obey you (Luke 17:6). Yes, you took up the tabernacle of Moloch, and the star of your god Remphan, figures which you made to worship them: and I will carry you away beyond Babylon (Acts 7:43). Aristarchus my fellowprisoner salutes you, and Marcus, sister's son to Barnabas, (touching whom you received commandments: if he come unto you, receive him;) (Colossians 4:10). We have also a more sure word of prophecy; whereunto you do well that you take heed, as unto a light that shines in a dark place, until the day dawn, and the day star arise in your hearts: (2 Peter 1:19).

AlphabetSequence.Word: You are the Star and we followed ... You.

CaseBasedReasoning.Commentary: Wake-up Orientation: Knees bowed, and hands inside the thighs, the left thumb on the right thigh. Turn on the computer: Left fingers twitches. Delete the WordEngineering backup files. Empty the Recycle Bin. Blow nose, 2 hair will come out, the shorter hair will have is white on its lower left exterior, the longer hair will have 2 upper boundaries and a lower boundary. Kokuho Rice U.S. #1 Extra Fancy New Crop Net Wt. 20LBS 9.07kg.

ClassAssociates.Commentary: Shutdown the left computer, Comfort ... Comfort computer noise. Kokuho Rice U.S. #1 Extra Fancy New Crop Net Wt. 20LBS 9.07kg ... Smell. Sleep: Smell. Turn on the computer: Smell ... Left fingers twitches ... Keyboard error. Mouse ...
